mapper.insert: insert into pg_database (datname, datdba, `encoding`, datcollate, datctype, datistemplate, datallowconn, datconnlimit, datlastsysoid, datfrozenxid, datminmxid, dattablespace, datacl) values (#{datname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{datdba,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{encoding,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{datcollate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{datctype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{datistemplate,jdbcType=BIT}, #{datallowconn,jdbcType=BIT}, #{datconnlimit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{datlastsysoid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{datfrozenxid,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{datminmxid,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{dattablespace,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{datacl,jdbcType=ARRAY})
mapper.select: select datname, datdba, `encoding`, datcollate, datctype, datistemplate, datallowconn, datconnlimit, datlastsysoid, datfrozenxid, datminmxid, dattablespace, datacl from pg_database
